review: When I first got this product I was impressed. But the honey moon period is over. It constantly freezes, crashes, and simply doesn't work well. Very disappointing. I urge you to look at other options.
author: Teresa K

review: Constant WI-FI network connection issues which seem to be getting worse. No matter the app, distance to the router or distance from the TV using 6 ft HDMI extension. JUNK!
author: Daniel H

review: I absolutely love it.  Perfect for my needs,  Small remote the only thing I would do would be to put a few more instructions about turning it off on the paperwork that comes with it.  Us old folks like written instructions.
author: Peggy Stephenson

review: When it is working, the Fire TV Stick is awesome (fast connection, unobtrusive) - however consistency is it's downfall. Some days it works like a charm, other days it turns off the TV automatically, or requires restarting it to access certain applications (like SlingTV). These issues seem to be random - same WiFi connection, some hardware, etc
author: A. Fortner

review: Have 2 of them and they work GREAT!! Very happy, exceeded expectations and would recommend to anyone.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Bought mostly to extend get my Plex on TV. Unfortunately Fire TV stick is not compatible with DTS or 5.1 pass-through HDMI. Aside from this issue great overall solution, especially for prime users with movies and music access.
